info.name: Delivery Champs Customer Apis
info.description: This collection is only for Delivery Champs customer app.

formdata.description: required if type is Product.it is serving size of product
it should be Product or Deal
optional.17 is addon id and its value is addon product model id.
optional.6 is addon id and its value is addon product model id.nested array coz addons can be multiple selection(checkboxes)
it should be CartProduct or CartDeal.these are models

query.description: it is selected product serving size.required if u choose Product.

formdata.description: cart item id.this id is should be from tables mentioned below.
two typs.it is associated with tables CartProduct and CartDeal.if you are removing product then use CartProduct if Deal then put CartDeal
there are two methods card and cash.
required_if shipping_type_id ==1,which means delivery. user address id.you can get this from user address api.

formdata.value: hi this is from app order first

formdata.description: it should be 'app'.it is a flag
it is required if you select payment method card.stripe token.
is_voucher_discount variable is 1 if code is voucher code is given and verified otherwise it will be 0

item.name: order place new api not in used
